summary: Iteration 5 testing complete. All 10 backend tests passed. Frontend testing verified owner dropdowns in Organization/Contact/Opportunity edit forms, Add Opportunity from Organization page, Delete functionality, and confirmed no demo users (Alex Thompson, Jordan Pierce) in user list.

issues: Minor: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent (console warning, not blocking)

passed_tests: Backend: No demo users (Alex Thompson, Jordan Pierce) in /api/auth/users endpoint
Backend: Users endpoint returns exactly 7 authorized users
Backend: Change organization owner via PUT endpoint
Backend: Change contact owner via PUT endpoint
Backend: Change opportunity owner via PUT endpoint
Backend: Create opportunity linked to organization (from org page)
Backend: Delete opportunity also deletes related activities
Frontend: Owner dropdown visible in Organization edit form (7 users shown)
Frontend: Owner dropdown visible in Contact edit form (7 users shown)
Frontend: Owner dropdown visible in Opportunity edit form (7 users shown)
Frontend: Add Opportunity button on Organization detail page
Frontend: Create opportunity from Organization page works correctly
Frontend: Delete Organization button visible with red styling
Frontend: No demo users in owner dropdowns (verified: Arman Bozorgmanesh, Brian Clements, Jamie Eigner, Kyle Heppenstall, Randy Chiu, Ray Khacharoutian, Seth Cushing)
seed_data_creation: Tests created test data with TEST_ prefix and cleaned up after each test
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 5 features verified working: 1) Owner dropdowns in all entity edit forms work correctly with 7 authorized users. 2) Add Opportunity button on Organization detail page creates opportunities linked to that org. 3) Delete functionality works for organizations, contacts, and opportunities (including cascade delete of activities). 4) Demo users (Alex Thompson, Jordan Pierce) have been removed from the system - only 7 authorized CompassX users remain.

verified_features.change_owner_organization: Working - Owner dropdown in edit form saves correctly
verified_features.change_owner_contact: Working - Owner dropdown in edit form saves correctly
verified_features.change_owner_opportunity: Working - Owner dropdown in edit form saves correctly
verified_features.create_opportunity_from_org: Working - Add Opportunity button opens dialog, creates opportunity linked to org
verified_features.delete_organization: Working - Delete button visible, backend DELETE endpoint works
verified_features.delete_contact: Working - Delete button visible, backend DELETE endpoint works
verified_features.delete_opportunity: Working - Delete button visible, backend DELETE endpoint works, also deletes activities
verified_features.no_demo_users: Verified - Only 7 authorized users returned (no Alex Thompson or Jordan Pierce)
